string.text: A Military Spec Radio Sometimes Found Around Broken Down Vehicles. Junk To Most, But Maybe Someone Out There Would Pay Handsomely For It.
A Burnt-Out Military Signal Amplification Unit That Has Been Torn From An Abandoned Vehicle. Junk To Most But Maybe Valuable To The Right People.
Check The Box and Click Apply At The Bottom To Reset Kits.

Minimum Toolkits Per Zone. This include Basic, Advanced and Expert Tools along with gunsmithing tools, drugmaking kits, light, medium, heavy and helmet repair kits. Not all kits can be found in all zones. Expert tools can not be found in the most southern zones for example.

Maximum Toolkits Per Zone. This include Basic, Advanced and Expert Tools along with gunsmithing tools, drugmaking kits, light, medium, heavy and helmet repair kits. Not all kits can be found in all zones. Expert tools can not be found in the most southern zones for example.

Minimum other non-toolkit valuables per zone such as upgrade kits(previously only found on dead bodies), various cleaning kits, LLMCs, even a working headlamp, echo- detector or multitool if youre really lucky

Maximum other non-toolkit valuables per zone such as upgrade kits(previously only found on dead bodies), various cleaning kits, LLMCs, even a working headlamp, echo- detector or multitool if youre really lucky
